rows.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ سَنُدْخِلُهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا ۖ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقًّا ۚ وَمَنْ أَصْدَقُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ قِيلًا
rows.translation: And (as for) those who believe and do good, We will make them enter into gardens beneath which rivers flow, to abide therein for ever; (it is) a promise of Allah, true (indeed), and who is truer of word than Allah?
rows.transliteration: wal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti sanudkhiluhum jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā abadā ۖ wa`dallāhi ḥaqqā ۚ wa man aṣdaqu minallāhi qīlā

rows.arabic: لَّيْسَ بِأَمَانِيِّكُمْ وَلَآ أَمَانِىِّ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ۗ مَن يَعْمَلْ سُوٓءًا يُجْزَ بِهِۦ وَلَا يَجِدْ لَهُۥ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيًّا وَلَا نَصِيرًا
rows.translation: (This) shall not be in accordance with your vain desires nor in accordance with the vain desires of the followers of the Book; whoever does evil, he shall be requited with it, and besides Allah he will find for himself neither a guardian nor a helper.
rows.transliteration: laysa bi-amāniyyikum walā amāniyyi ahlil kitāb ۗ man ya`mal sū-an yujza bihi walā yajid lahu min dūnillāhi waliyyan walā naṣīrā

rows.arabic: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ مِن ذَكَرٍ أَوْ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يَدْخُلُونَ ٱلْجَنَّةَ وَلَا يُظْلَمُونَ نَقِيرًا
rows.translation: And whoever does good deeds whether male or female and he (or she) is a believer-- these shall enter the garden, and they shall not be dealt with a jot unjustly.
rows.transliteration: wa man ya`mal minaṣ ṣāliḥāti min dhakarin aw unthā wahuwa mu-minun fa-ulā-ika yadkhulūnal jannata walā yuẓlamūna naqīrā

rows.arabic: وَمَنْ أَحْسَنُ دِينًا مِّمَّنْ أَسْلَمَ وَجْهَهُۥ لِلَّهِ وَهُوَ مُحْسِنٌ وَٱتَّبَعَ مِلَّةَ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ حَنِيفًا ۗ وَٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ خَلِيلًا
rows.translation: And who has a better religion than he who submits himself entirely to Allah? And he is the doer of good (to others) and follows the faith of Ibrahim, the upright one, and Allah took Ibrahim as a friend.
rows.transliteration: wa man aḥsanu dīnan mimman aslama wajhahu lillāhi wahuwa muḥsinun wattaba`a millata ibrāhīma ḥanīfā ۗ wattakhadhallāhu ibrāhīma khalīlā

rows.arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ مُّحِيطًا
rows.translation: And whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth is Allah's; and Allah encompasses all things.
rows.transliteration: walillāhi mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ ۚ wakānallāhu bikulli shay-in muḥīṭā

rows.arabic: وَيَسْتَفْتُونَكَ فِى ٱلنِّسَآءِ ۖ قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يُفْتِيكُمْ فِيهِنَّ وَمَا يُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ فِى يَتَـٰمَى ٱلنِّسَآءِ ٱلَّـٰتِى لَا تُؤْتُونَهُنَّ مَا كُتِبَ لَهُنَّ وَتَرْغَبُونَ أَن تَنكِحُوهُنَّ وَٱلْمُسْتَضْعَفِينَ مِنَ ٱلْوِلْدَٰنِ وَأَن تَقُومُوا۟ لِلْيَتَـٰمَىٰ بِٱلْقِسْطِ ۚ وَمَا تَفْعَلُوا۟ مِنْ خَيْرٍ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِهِۦ عَلِيمًا
rows.translation: And they ask you a decision about women. Say: Allah makes known to you His decision concerning them, and that which is recited to you in the Book concerning female orphans whom you do not give what is appointed for them while you desire to marry them, and concerning the weak among children, and that you should deal towards orphans with equity; and whatever good you do, Allah surely knows it.
rows.transliteration: wayastaftūnaka fin nisā-i ۖ qulillāhu yuftīkum fīhinna wa mā yutlā `alaykum fil kitābi fī yatāman nisā-il lātī lā tu-tūnahunna mā kutiba lahunna watarghabūna an tankiḥūhunna wal mustaḍ`afīna minal wildāni wa-an taqūmū lilyatāmā bil qisṭ ۚ wa mā taf`alū min khayrin fa-innallāha kāna bihi `alīmā

rows.arabic: وَإِنِ ٱمْرَأَةٌ خَافَتْ مِنۢ بَعْلِهَا نُشُوزًا أَوْ إِعْرَاضًا فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِمَآ أَن يُصْلِحَا بَيْنَهُمَا صُلْحًا ۚ وَٱلصُّلْحُ خَيْرٌ ۗ وَأُحْضِرَتِ ٱلْأَنفُسُ ٱلشُّحَّ ۚ وَإِن تُحْسِنُوا۟ وَتَتَّقُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرًا
rows.translation: And if a woman fears ill usage or desertion on the part of her husband, there is no blame on them, if they effect a reconciliation between them, and reconciliation is better, and avarice has been made to be present in the (people's) minds; and if you do good (to others) and guard (against evil), then surely Allah is aware of what you do.
rows.transliteration: wa inim-ra-atun khāfat min ba`lihā nushūzan aw i`rāḍan falā junāḥa `alayhimā an yuṣliḥā baynahumā ṣulḥā ۚ waṣ ṣulḥu khayr ۗ wa-uḥḍiratil-anfusush shuḥḥ ۚ wa in tuḥsinū watattaqū fa-innallāha kāna bimā ta`malūna khabīrā

rows.arabic: وَلَن تَسْتَطِيعُوٓا۟ أَن تَعْدِلُوا۟ بَيْنَ ٱلنِّسَآءِ وَلَوْ حَرَصْتُمْ ۖ فَلَا تَمِيلُوا۟ كُلَّ ٱلْمَيْلِ فَتَذَرُوهَا كَٱلْمُعَلَّقَةِ ۚ وَإِن تُصْلِحُوا۟ وَتَتَّقُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا
rows.translation: And you have it not in your power to do justice between wives, even though you may wish (it), but be not disinclined (from one) with total disinclination, so that you leave her as it were in suspense; and if you effect a reconciliation and guard (against evil), then surely Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
rows.transliteration: walan tastaṭī`ū an ta`dilū baynan nisā-i walaw ḥaraṣtum ۖ falā tamīlū kullal-mayli fatadharūhā kal mu`allaqah ۚ wa in tuṣliḥū watattaqū fa-innallāha kāna ghafūran raḥīmā

rows.arabic: وَإِن يَتَفَرَّقَا يُغْنِ ٱللَّهُ كُلًّا مِّن سَعَتِهِۦ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ وَٰسِعًا حَكِيمًا
rows.translation: And if they separate, Allah will render them both free from want out of His ampleness, and Allah is Ample-giving, Wise.
rows.transliteration: wa in yatafarraqā yughnillāhu kullan min sa`atih ۚ wakānallāhu wāsi`an ḥakīmā

rows.arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ وَلَقَدْ وَصَّيْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ وَإِيَّاكُمْ أَنِ ٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۚ وَإِن تَكْفُرُوا۟ فَإِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَنِيًّا حَمِيدًا
rows.translation: And whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth is Allah's and certainly We enjoined those who were given the Book before you and (We enjoin) you too that you should be careful of (your duty to) Allah; and if you disbelieve, then surely whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth is Allah's and Allah is Self-sufficient, Praise-worthy.
rows.transliteration: walillāhi mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ ۗ walaqad waṣṣaynal ladhīna ūtul kitāba min qablikum wa iyyākum anit-taqullāh ۚ wa in takfurū fa-inna lillāhi mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ ۚ wakānallāhu ghaniyyan ḥamīdā

rows.arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلًا
rows.translation: And whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth is Allah's, and Allah is sufficient as a Protector.
rows.transliteration: walillāhi mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ ۚ wakafā billāhi wakīlā

rows.arabic: إِن يَشَأْ يُذْهِبْكُمْ أَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ وَيَأْتِ بِـَٔاخَرِينَ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ قَدِيرًا
rows.translation: If He please, He can make you pass away, O people! and bring others; and Allah has the power to do this.
rows.transliteration: in yasha-yudh-hibkum ayyuhan nāsu waya-ti bi-ākharīn ۚ wakānallāhu `alā dhālika qadīrā

rows.arabic: مَّن كَانَ يُرِيدُ ثَوَابَ ٱلدُّنْيَا فَعِندَ ٱللَّهِ ثَوَابُ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ سَمِيعًۢا بَصِيرًا
rows.translation: Whoever desires the reward of this world, then with Allah is the reward of this world and the hereafter; and Allah is Hearing, Seeing.
rows.transliteration: man kāna yurīdu thawābad dunyā fa`indallāhi thawābud dunyā wal-ākhirah ۚ wakānallāhu samī`an baṣīrā

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ كُونُوا۟ قَوَّٰمِينَ بِٱلْقِسْطِ شُهَدَآءَ لِلَّهِ وَلَوْ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ أَوِ ٱلْوَٰلِدَيْنِ وَٱلْأَقْرَبِينَ ۚ إِن يَكُنْ غَنِيًّا أَوْ فَقِيرًا فَٱللَّهُ أَوْلَىٰ بِهِمَا ۖ فَلَا تَتَّبِعُوا۟ ٱلْهَوَىٰٓ أَن تَعْدِلُوا۟ ۚ وَإِن تَلْوُۥٓا۟ أَوْ تُعْرِضُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرًا
rows.translation: O you who believe! be maintainers of justice, bearers of witness of Allah's sake, though it may be against your own selves or (your) parents or near relatives; if he be rich or poor, Allah is nearer to them both in compassion; therefore do not follow (your) low desires, lest you deviate; and if you swerve or turn aside, then surely Allah is aware of what you do.
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū kūnū qawwāmīna bil qisṭi shuhadā-a lillāhi walaw `alā anfusikum awil wālidayni wal-aqrabīn ۚ in yakun ghaniyyan aw faqīran fallāhu awlā bihimā ۖ falā tattabi`ul hawā an ta`dilū ۚ wa in talū aw tu`riḍū fa-innallāha kāna bimā ta`malūna khabīrā

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ ءَامِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ٱلَّذِى نَزَّلَ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ وَٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلَ مِن قَبْلُ ۚ وَمَن يَكْفُرْ بِٱللَّهِ وَمَلَـٰٓئِكَتِهِۦ وَكُتُبِهِۦ وَرُسُلِهِۦ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ فَقَدْ ضَلَّ ضَلَـٰلًۢا بَعِيدًا
rows.translation: O you who believe! believe in Allah and His Apostle and the Book which He has revealed to His Apostle and the Book which He revealed before; and whoever disbelieves in Allah and His angels and His apostles and the last day, he indeed strays off into a remote error.
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū āminū billāhi warasūlihi wal kitābil ladhī nazzala `alā rasūlihi wal kitābil ladhī anzala min qabl ۚ wa man yakfur billāhi wa malā-ikatihi wakutubihi warusulihi wal yawmil-ākhiri faqad ḍalla ḍalālan ba`īdā

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ثُمَّ كَفَرُوا۟ ثُمَّ ءَامَنُوا۟ ثُمَّ كَفَرُوا۟ ثُمَّ ٱزْدَادُوا۟ كُفْرًا لَّمْ يَكُنِ ٱللَّهُ لِيَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ وَلَا لِيَهْدِيَهُمْ سَبِيلًۢا
rows.translation: Surely (as for) those who believe then disbelieve, again believe and again disbelieve, then increase in disbelief, Allah will not forgive them nor guide them in the (right) path.
rows.transliteration: innal ladhīna āmanū thumma kafarū thumma āmanū thumma kafarū thummaz-dādū kufral lam yakunillāhu liyaghfira lahum walā liyahdiyahum sabīlā

rows.arabic: بَشِّرِ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
rows.translation: Announce to the hypocrites that they shall have a painful chastisement:
rows.transliteration: bashhiril munāfiqīna bi-anna lahum `adhāban alīmā

rows.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَّخِذُونَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ أَوْلِيَآءَ مِن دُونِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ ۚ أَيَبْتَغُونَ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْعِزَّةَ فَإِنَّ ٱلْعِزَّةَ لِلَّهِ جَمِيعًا
rows.translation: Those who take the unbelievers for guardians rather than believers. Do they seek honor from them? Then surely all honor is for Allah.
rows.transliteration: alladhīna yattakhidhūnal kāfirīna awliyā-a min dūnil mu-minīn ۚ ayabtaghūna `indahumul `izzata fa-innal `izzata lillāhi jamī`ā

rows.arabic: وَقَدْ نَزَّلَ عَلَيْكُمْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ أَنْ إِذَا سَمِعْتُمْ ءَايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ يُكْفَرُ بِهَا وَيُسْتَهْزَأُ بِهَا فَلَا تَقْعُدُوا۟ مَعَهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يَخُوضُوا۟ فِى حَدِيثٍ غَيْرِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّكُمْ إِذًا مِّثْلُهُمْ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ جَامِعُ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ وَٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ فِى جَهَنَّمَ جَمِيعًا
rows.translation: And indeed He has revealed to you in the Book that when you hear Allah's communications disbelieved in and mocked at do not sit with them until they enter into some other discourse; surely then you would be like them; surely Allah will gather together the hypocrites and the unbelievers all in hell.
rows.transliteration: waqad nazzala `alaykum fil kitābi an idhā sami`tum āyātillāhi yukfaru bihā wayustahza-u bihā falā taq`udū ma`ahum ḥattā yakhūḍū fī ḥadīthin ghayrih ۚ innakum idhan mithluhum ۗ innallāha jāmi`ul munāfiqīna wal kāfirīna fī jahannama jamī`ā

rows.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَرَبَّصُونَ بِكُمْ فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمْ فَتْحٌ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ قَالُوٓا۟ أَلَمْ نَكُن مَّعَكُمْ وَإِن كَانَ لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ نَصِيبٌ قَالُوٓا۟ أَلَمْ نَسْتَحْوِذْ عَلَيْكُمْ وَنَمْنَعْكُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ ۚ فَٱللَّهُ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۗ وَلَن يَجْعَلَ ٱللَّهُ لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ عَلَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ سَبِيلًا
rows.translation: Those who wait for (some misfortune to befall) you then If you have a victory from Allah they say: Were we not with you? And if there is a chance for the unbelievers, they say: Did we not acquire the mastery over you and defend you from the believers? So Allah shall Judge between you on the day of resurrection, and Allah will by no means give the unbelievers a way against the believers.
rows.transliteration: alladhīna yatarabbaṣūna bikum fa-in kāna lakum fat-ḥun minallāhi qālū alam nakun ma`akum wa in kāna lilkāfirīna naṣībun qālū alam nastaḥwidh `alaykum wanamna`kum minal mu-minīn ۚ fallāhu yaḥkumu baynakum yawmal qiyāmah ۗ walan yaj`alallāhu lilkāfirīna `alal-mu-minīna sabīlā

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ يُخَـٰدِعُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَهُوَ خَـٰدِعُهُمْ وَإِذَا قَامُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ قَامُوا۟ كُسَالَىٰ يُرَآءُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ وَلَا يَذْكُرُونَ ٱللَّهَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
rows.translation: Surely the hypocrites strive to deceive Allah, and He shall requite their deceit to them, and when they stand up to prayer they stand up sluggishly; they do it only to be seen of men and do not remember Allah save a little.
rows.transliteration: innal munāfiqīna yukhādi`ūnallāha wahuwa khādi`uhum wa idhā qāmū ilaṣ ṣalāti qāmū kusālā yurā-ūnan nāsa walā yadhkurūnallāha illā qalīlā

rows.arabic: مُّذَبْذَبِينَ بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ لَآ إِلَىٰ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَلَآ إِلَىٰ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ۚ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُۥ سَبِيلًا
rows.translation: Wavering between that (and this), (belonging) neither to these nor to those; and whomsoever Allah causes to err, you shall not find a way for him.
rows.transliteration: mudhabdhabīna bayna dhālika lā ilā hā-ulā-i walā ilā hā-ulā-i ۚ wa man yuḍlilillāhu falan tajida lahu sabīlā

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَتَّخِذُوا۟ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ أَوْلِيَآءَ مِن دُونِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ ۚ أَتُرِيدُونَ أَن تَجْعَلُوا۟ لِلَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ سُلْطَـٰنًا مُّبِينًا
rows.translation: O you who believe! do not take the unbelievers for friends rather than the believers; do you desire that you should give to Allah a manifest proof against yourselves?
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū lā tattakhidhul kāfirīna awliyā-a min dūnil mu-minīn ۚ aturīdūna an taj`alū lillāhi `alaykum sulṭānan mubīnā

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ فِى ٱلدَّرْكِ ٱلْأَسْفَلِ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُمْ نَصِيرًا
rows.translation: Surely the hypocrites are in the lowest stage of the fire and you shall not find a helper for them.
rows.transliteration: innal munāfiqīna fid darkil-asfali minan nāri walan tajida lahum naṣīrā

rows.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ تَابُوا۟ وَأَصْلَحُوا۟ وَٱعْتَصَمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَأَخْلَصُوا۟ دِينَهُمْ لِلَّهِ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ مَعَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ ۖ وَسَوْفَ يُؤْتِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ أَجْرًا عَظِيمًا
rows.translation: Except those who repent and amend and hold fast to Allah and are sincere in their religion to Allah, these are with the believers, and Allah will grant the believers a mighty reward.
rows.transliteration: illal ladhīna tābū wa-aṣlaḥū wa`taṣamū billāhi wa-akhlaṣū dīnahum lillāhi fa-ulā-ika ma`al mu-minīn ۖ wasawfa yu-tillāhul mu-minīna ajran `aẓīmā

rows.arabic: مَّا يَفْعَلُ ٱللَّهُ بِعَذَابِكُمْ إِن شَكَرْتُمْ وَءَامَنتُمْ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ شَاكِرًا عَلِيمًا
rows.translation: Why should Allah chastise you if you are grateful and believe? And Allah is the Multiplier of rewards, Knowing
rows.transliteration: mā yaf`alullāhu bi`adhābikum in shakartum wa-āmantum ۚ wakānallāhu shākiran `alīmā

rows.arabic: لَّا يُحِبُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْجَهْرَ بِٱلسُّوٓءِ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْلِ إِلَّا مَن ظُلِمَ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ سَمِيعًا عَلِيمًا
rows.translation: Allah does not love the public utterance of hurtful speech unless (it be) by one to whom injustice has been done; and Allah is Hearing, Knowing.
rows.transliteration: lā yuḥibbullāhul jahra bis sū-i minal qawli illā man ẓulim ۚ wakānallāhu samī`an `alīmā

rows.arabic: إِن تُبْدُوا۟ خَيْرًا أَوْ تُخْفُوهُ أَوْ تَعْفُوا۟ عَن سُوٓءٍ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَفُوًّا قَدِيرًا
rows.translation: If you do good openly or do it in secret or pardon an evil then surely Allah is Pardoning, Powerful.
rows.transliteration: in tubdū khayran aw tukhfūhu aw ta`fū `an sū-in fa-innallāha kāna `afuwwan qadīrā

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَكْفُرُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦ وَيُرِيدُونَ أَن يُفَرِّقُوا۟ بَيْنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦ وَيَقُولُونَ نُؤْمِنُ بِبَعْضٍ وَنَكْفُرُ بِبَعْضٍ وَيُرِيدُونَ أَن يَتَّخِذُوا۟ بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ سَبِيلًا
rows.translation: Surely those who disbelieve in Allah and His apostles and (those who) desire to make a distinction between Allah and His apostles and say: We believe in some and disbelieve in others, and desire to take a course between (this and) that.
rows.transliteration: innal ladhīna yakfurūna billāhi warusulihi wayurīdūna an yufarriqū baynallāhi warusulihi wayaqūlūna nu-minu biba`ḍin wanakfuru biba`ḍin wayurīdūna an yattakhidhū bayna dhālika sabīlā

rows.arabic: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ حَقًّا ۚ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ عَذَابًا مُّهِينًا
rows.translation: These it is that are truly unbelievers, and We have prepared for the unbelievers a disgraceful chastisement.
rows.transliteration: ulā-ika humul kāfirūna ḥaqqā ۚ wa-a`tadnā lilkāfirīna `adhāban muhīnā

rows.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦ وَلَمْ يُفَرِّقُوا۟ بَيْنَ أَحَدٍ مِّنْهُمْ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ سَوْفَ يُؤْتِيهِمْ أُجُورَهُمْ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا
rows.translation: And those who believe in Allah and His apostles and do not make a distinction between any of them-- Allah will grant them their rewards; and Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
rows.transliteration: wal ladhīna āmanū billāhi warusulihi walam yufarriqū bayna aḥadin minhum ulā-ika sawfa yu-tīhim ujūrahum ۗ wakānallāhu ghafūran raḥīmā

rows.arabic: يَسْـَٔلُكَ أَهْلُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ أَن تُنَزِّلَ عَلَيْهِمْ كِتَـٰبًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ۚ فَقَدْ سَأَلُوا۟ مُوسَىٰٓ أَكْبَرَ مِن ذَٰلِكَ فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَرِنَا ٱللَّهَ جَهْرَةً فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّـٰعِقَةُ بِظُلْمِهِمْ ۚ ثُمَّ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ ٱلْعِجْلَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَتْهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتُ فَعَفَوْنَا عَن ذَٰلِكَ ۚ وَءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَىٰ سُلْطَـٰنًا مُّبِينًا
rows.translation: The followers of the Book ask you to bring down to them a book from heaven; so indeed they demanded of Musa a greater thing than that, for they said: Show us Allah manifestly; so the lightning overtook them on account of their injustice. Then they took the calf (for a god), after clear signs had come to them, but We pardoned this; and We gave to Musa clear authority.
rows.transliteration: yas-aluka ahlul kitābi an tunazzila `alayhim kitāban minas samā-i ۚ faqad sa-alū mūsā akbara min dhālika faqālū arinallāha jahratan fa-akhadhat-humuṣ ṣā`iqatu biẓul-mihim ۚ thummat-takhadhul `ijla min ba`di mā jā-at humul bayyinātu fa`afawnā `an dhālik ۚ wa-ātaynā mūsā sulṭānan mubīnā

rows.arabic: وَرَفَعْنَا فَوْقَهُمُ ٱلطُّورَ بِمِيثَـٰقِهِمْ وَقُلْنَا لَهُمُ ٱدْخُلُوا۟ ٱلْبَابَ سُجَّدًا وَقُلْنَا لَهُمْ لَا تَعْدُوا۟ فِى ٱلسَّبْتِ وَأَخَذْنَا مِنْهُم مِّيثَـٰقًا غَلِيظًا
rows.translation: And We lifted the mountain (Sainai) over them at (the taking of the covenant) and We said to them: Enter the door making obeisance; and We said to them: Do not exceed the limits of the Sabbath, and We made with them a firm covenant.
rows.transliteration: warafa`nā fawqahumuṭ ṭūra bimīthāqihim waqulnā lahumud-khulul bāba sujjadan waqulnā lahum lā ta`dū fis sabti wa-akhadhnā minhum mīthāqan ghalīẓā

rows.arabic: فَبِمَا نَقْضِهِم مِّيثَـٰقَهُمْ وَكُفْرِهِم بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَقَتْلِهِمُ ٱلْأَنۢبِيَآءَ بِغَيْرِ حَقٍّ وَقَوْلِهِمْ قُلُوبُنَا غُلْفٌۢ ۚ بَلْ طَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهَا بِكُفْرِهِمْ فَلَا يُؤْمِنُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
rows.translation: Therefore, for their breaking their covenant and their disbelief in the communications of Allah and their killing the prophets wrongfully and their saying: Our hearts are covered; nay! Allah set a seal upon them owing to their unbelief, so they shall not believe except a few.
rows.transliteration: fabimā naqḍihim mīthāqahum wakufrihim bi-āyātillāhi waqatlihimul-anbiyā-a bighayri ḥaqqin waqawlihim qulūbunā ghulf ۚ bal ṭaba`allāhu `alayhā bikufrihim falā yu-minūna illā qalīlā

rows.arabic: وَبِكُفْرِهِمْ وَقَوْلِهِمْ عَلَىٰ مَرْيَمَ بُهْتَـٰنًا عَظِيمًا
rows.translation: And for their unbelief and for their having uttered against Marium a grievous calumny.
rows.transliteration: wabikufrihim waqawlihim `alā maryama buhtānan `aẓīmā

rows.arabic: وَقَوْلِهِمْ إِنَّا قَتَلْنَا ٱلْمَسِيحَ عِيسَى ٱبْنَ مَرْيَمَ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا قَتَلُوهُ وَمَا صَلَبُوهُ وَلَـٰكِن شُبِّهَ لَهُمْ ۚ وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱخْتَلَفُوا۟ فِيهِ لَفِى شَكٍّ مِّنْهُ ۚ مَا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنْ عِلْمٍ إِلَّا ٱتِّبَاعَ ٱلظَّنِّ ۚ وَمَا قَتَلُوهُ يَقِينًۢا
rows.translation: And their saying: Surely we have killed the Messiah, Isa son of Marium, the apostle of Allah; and they did not kill him nor did they crucify him, but it appeared to them so (like Isa) and most surely those who differ therein are only in a doubt about it; they have no knowledge respecting it, but only follow a conjecture, and they killed him not for sure.
rows.transliteration: waqawlihim innā qatalnal masīḥa `īsab-na maryama rasūlallāhi wa mā qatalūhu wa mā ṣalabūhu walākin shubbiha lahum ۚ wa innal ladhīnakh-talafū fīhi lafī shakkin minh ۚ mā lahum bihi min `il-min illat-tibā`aẓ ẓann ۚ wa mā qatalūhu yaqīnā

rows.arabic: بَل رَّفَعَهُ ٱللَّهُ إِلَيْهِ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا
rows.translation: Nay! Allah took him up to Himself; and Allah is Mighty, Wise.
rows.transliteration: bal rafa`ahullāhu ilayh ۚ wakānallāhu `azīzan ḥakīmā

rows.arabic: وَإِن مِّنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ إِلَّا لَيُؤْمِنَنَّ بِهِۦ قَبْلَ مَوْتِهِۦ ۖ وَيَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ يَكُونُ عَلَيْهِمْ شَهِيدًا
rows.translation: And there is not one of the followers of the Book but most certainly believes in this before his death, and on the day of resurrection he (Isa) shall be a witness against them.
rows.transliteration: wa in min ahlil kitābi illā layu-minanna bihi qabla mawtih ۖ wayawmal qiyāmati yakūnu `alayhim shahīdā

rows.arabic: فَبِظُلْمٍ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ هَادُوا۟ حَرَّمْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ طَيِّبَـٰتٍ أُحِلَّتْ لَهُمْ وَبِصَدِّهِمْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ كَثِيرًا
rows.translation: Wherefore for the iniquity of those who are Jews did We disallow to them the good things which had been made lawful for them and for their hindering many (people) from Allah's way.
rows.transliteration: fabiẓul-min minal ladhīna hādū ḥarramnā `alayhim ṭayyibātin uḥillat lahum wabiṣaddihim `an sabīlillāhi kathīrā

rows.arabic: وَأَخْذِهِمُ ٱلرِّبَوٰا۟ وَقَدْ نُهُوا۟ عَنْهُ وَأَكْلِهِمْ أَمْوَٰلَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلْبَـٰطِلِ ۚ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ مِنْهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
rows.translation: And their taking usury though indeed they were forbidden it and their devouring the property of people falsely, and We have prepared for the unbelievers from among them a painful chastisement.
rows.transliteration: wa-akhdhihimur ribā waqad nuhū `anhu wa-aklihim amwālan nāsi bil bāṭil ۚ wa-a`tadnā lilkāfirīna minhum `adhāban alīmā

rows.arabic: لَّـٰكِنِ ٱلرَّٰسِخُونَ فِى ٱلْعِلْمِ مِنْهُمْ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ مِن قَبْلِكَ ۚ وَٱلْمُقِيمِينَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ ۚ وَٱلْمُؤْتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ سَنُؤْتِيهِمْ أَجْرًا عَظِيمًا
rows.translation: But the firm in knowledge among them and the believers believe in what has been revealed to. you and what was revealed before you, and those who keep up prayers and those who give the poor-rate and the believers in Allah and the last day, these it is whom We will give a mighty reward.
rows.transliteration: lākinir rāsikhūna fil `il-mi minhum wal mu-minūna yu-minūna bimā unzila ilayka wa mā unzila min qablik ۚ wal muqīmīnaṣ ṣalāh ۚ wal mu-tūnaz zakāta wal mu-minūna billāhi wal yawmil-ākhiri ulā-ika sanu-tīhim ajran `aẓīmā

rows.arabic: إِنَّآ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْكَ كَمَآ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ نُوحٍ وَٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ ۚ وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰٓ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسْمَـٰعِيلَ وَإِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ وَٱلْأَسْبَاطِ وَعِيسَىٰ وَأَيُّوبَ وَيُونُسَ وَهَـٰرُونَ وَسُلَيْمَـٰنَ ۚ وَءَاتَيْنَا دَاوُۥدَ زَبُورًا
rows.translation: Surely We have revealed to you as We revealed to Nuh, and the prophets after him, and We revealed to Ibrahim and Ismail and Ishaq and Yaqoub and the tribes, and Isa and Ayub and Yunus and Haroun and Sulaiman and We gave to Dawood
rows.transliteration: innā awḥaynā ilayka kamā awḥaynā ilā nūḥin wan nabiyyīna min ba`dih ۚ wa-awḥaynā ilā ibrāhīma wa ismā`īla wa is-ḥāqa waya`qūba wal-asbāṭi wa`īsā wa-ayyūba wayūnusa wahārūna wasulaymān ۚ wa-ātaynā dāwūda zabūrā

rows.arabic: وَرُسُلًا قَدْ قَصَصْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَيْكَ مِن قَبْلُ وَرُسُلًا لَّمْ نَقْصُصْهُمْ عَلَيْكَ ۚ وَكَلَّمَ ٱللَّهُ مُوسَىٰ تَكْلِيمًا
rows.translation: And (We sent) apostles We have mentioned to you before and apostles we have not mentioned to you; and to Musa, Allah addressed His Word, speaking (to him):
rows.transliteration: warusulan qad qaṣaṣnāhum `alayka min qablu warusulal lam naqṣuṣ-hum `alayk ۚ wakallamallāhu mūsā taklīmā

rows.arabic: رُّسُلًا مُّبَشِّرِينَ وَمُنذِرِينَ لِئَلَّا يَكُونَ لِلنَّاسِ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ حُجَّةٌۢ بَعْدَ ٱلرُّسُلِ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا
rows.translation: (We sent) apostles as the givers of good news and as warners, so that people should not have a plea against Allah after the (coming of) apostles; and Allah is Mighty, Wise.
rows.transliteration: rusulan mubashhirīna wa mundhirīna li-allā yakūna linnāsi `alallāhi ḥujjatun ba`dar rusul ۚ wakānallāhu `azīzan ḥakīmā

rows.arabic: لَّـٰكِنِ ٱللَّهُ يَشْهَدُ بِمَآ أَنزَلَ إِلَيْكَ ۖ أَنزَلَهُۥ بِعِلْمِهِۦ ۖ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ يَشْهَدُونَ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدًا
rows.translation: But Allah bears witness by what He has revealed to you that He has revealed it with His knowledge, and the angels bear witness (also); and Allah is sufficient as a witness.
rows.transliteration: lākinillāhu yash-hadu bimā anzala ilayk ۖ anzalahu bi`il-mih ۖ wal malā-ikatu yash-hadūn ۚ wakafā billāhi shahīdā

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ قَدْ ضَلُّوا۟ ضَلَـٰلًۢا بَعِيدًا
rows.translation: Surely (as for) those who disbelieve and hinder (men) from Allah's way, they indeed have strayed off into a remote
rows.transliteration: innal ladhīna kafarū waṣaddū `an sabīlillāhi qad ḍallū ḍalālan ba`īdā

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَظَلَمُوا۟ لَمْ يَكُنِ ٱللَّهُ لِيَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ وَلَا لِيَهْدِيَهُمْ طَرِيقًا
rows.translation: Surely (as for) those who disbelieve and act unjustly Allah will not forgive them nor guide them to a path
rows.transliteration: innal ladhīna kafarū waẓalamū lam yakunillāhu liyaghfira lahum walā liyahdiyahum ṭarīqā

rows.arabic: إِلَّا طَرِيقَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا ۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرًا
rows.translation: Except the path of hell, to abide in it for ever, and this is easy to Allah.
rows.transliteration: illā ṭarīqa jahannama khālidīna fīhā abadā ۚ wakāna dhālika `alallāhi yasīrā

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ قَدْ جَآءَكُمُ ٱلرَّسُولُ بِٱلْحَقِّ مِن رَّبِّكُمْ فَـَٔامِنُوا۟ خَيْرًا لَّكُمْ ۚ وَإِن تَكْفُرُوا۟ فَإِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
rows.translation: O people! surely the Apostle has come to you with the truth from your Lord, therefore believe, (it shall be) good for you and If you disbelieve, then surely whatever is in the heavens and the earth is Allah's; and Allah is Knowing, Wise.
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhan nāsu qad jā-akumur rasūlu bil ḥaqqi min rabbikum fa-āminū khayral lakum ۚ wa in takfurū fa-inna lillāhi mā fis samāwāti wal-arḍ ۚ wakānallāhu `alīman ḥakīmā

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَهْلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ لَا تَغْلُوا۟ فِى دِينِكُمْ وَلَا تَقُولُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلْحَقَّ ۚ إِنَّمَا ٱلْمَسِيحُ عِيسَى ٱبْنُ مَرْيَمَ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ وَكَلِمَتُهُۥٓ أَلْقَىٰهَآ إِلَىٰ مَرْيَمَ وَرُوحٌ مِّنْهُ ۖ فَـَٔامِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦ ۖ وَلَا تَقُولُوا۟ ثَلَـٰثَةٌ ۚ ٱنتَهُوا۟ خَيْرًا لَّكُمْ ۚ إِنَّمَا ٱللَّهُ إِلَـٰهٌ وَٰحِدٌ ۖ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥٓ أَن يَكُونَ لَهُۥ وَلَدٌ ۘ لَّهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلًا
rows.translation: O followers of the Book! do not exceed the limits in your religion, and do not speak (lies) against Allah, but (speak) the truth; the Messiah, Isa son of Marium is only an apostle of Allah and His Word which He communicated to Marium and a spirit from Him; believe therefore in Allah and His apostles, and say not, Three. Desist, it is better for you; Allah is only one Allah; far be It from His glory that He should have a son, whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth is His, and Allah is sufficient for a Protector.
rows.transliteration: yā-ahlal-kitābi lā taghlū fī dīnikum walā taqūlū `alallāhi illal-ḥaqq ۚ innamal masīḥu `īsab-nu maryama rasūlullāhi wakalimatuhu alqāhā ilā maryama warūḥun minh ۖ fa-āminū billāhi warusulih ۖ walā taqūlū thalāthah ۚ in-tahū khayral lakum ۚ innamallāhu ilāhun wāḥid ۖ subḥānahu an yakūna lahu walad ۘ lahu mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ ۗ wakafā billāhi wakīlā

rows.arabic: لَّن يَسْتَنكِفَ ٱلْمَسِيحُ أَن يَكُونَ عَبْدًا لِّلَّهِ وَلَا ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ ۚ وَمَن يَسْتَنكِفْ عَنْ عِبَادَتِهِۦ وَيَسْتَكْبِرْ فَسَيَحْشُرُهُمْ إِلَيْهِ جَمِيعًا
rows.translation: The Messiah does by no means disdain that he should be a servant of Allah, nor do the angels who are near to Him, and whoever disdains His service and is proud, He will gather them all together to Himself.
rows.transliteration: lan yastankifal masīḥu an yakūna `abdal lillāhi walal malā-ikatul muqarrabūn ۚ wa man yastankif `an `ibādatihi wayastakbir fasayaḥshuruhum ilayhi jamī`ā

rows.arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَيُوَفِّيهِمْ أُجُورَهُمْ وَيَزِيدُهُم مِّن فَضْلِهِۦ ۖ وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسْتَنكَفُوا۟ وَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ فَيُعَذِّبُهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا وَلَا يَجِدُونَ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيًّا وَلَا نَصِيرًا
rows.translation: Then as for those who believe and do good, He will pay them fully their rewards and give them more out of His grace; and as for those who disdain and are proud, He will chastise them with a painful chastisement. And they shall not find for themselves besides Allah a guardian or a helper
rows.transliteration: fa-ammal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti fayuwaffīhim ujūrahum wayazīduhum min faḍlih ۖ wa-ammal ladhīnas-tankafū wastakbarū fayu`adhhibuhum `adhāban alīman walā yajidūna lahum min dūnillāhi waliyyan walā naṣīrā

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ قَدْ جَآءَكُم بُرْهَـٰنٌ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَأَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكُمْ نُورًا مُّبِينًا
rows.translation: O people! surely there has come to you manifest proof from your Lord and We have sent to you clear light.
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhan nāsu qad jā-akum burhānun min rabbikum wa-anzalnā ilaykum nūran mubīnā

rows.arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱعْتَصَمُوا۟ بِهِۦ فَسَيُدْخِلُهُمْ فِى رَحْمَةٍ مِّنْهُ وَفَضْلٍ وَيَهْدِيهِمْ إِلَيْهِ صِرَٰطًا مُّسْتَقِيمًا
rows.translation: Then as for those who believe in Allah and hold fast by Him, He will cause them to enter into His mercy and grace and guide them to Himself on a right path.
rows.transliteration: fa-ammal ladhīna āmanū billāhi wa`taṣamū bihi fasayudkhiluhum fī raḥmatim minhu wafaḍlin wayahdīhim ilayhi ṣirāṭan mustaqīmā

rows.arabic: يَسْتَفْتُونَكَ قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يُفْتِيكُمْ فِى ٱلْكَلَـٰلَةِ ۚ إِنِ ٱمْرُؤٌا۟ هَلَكَ لَيْسَ لَهُۥ وَلَدٌ وَلَهُۥٓ أُخْتٌ فَلَهَا نِصْفُ مَا تَرَكَ ۚ وَهُوَ يَرِثُهَآ إِن لَّمْ يَكُن لَّهَا وَلَدٌ ۚ فَإِن كَانَتَا ٱثْنَتَيْنِ فَلَهُمَا ٱلثُّلُثَانِ مِمَّا تَرَكَ ۚ وَإِن كَانُوٓا۟ إِخْوَةً رِّجَالًا وَنِسَآءً فَلِلذَّكَرِ مِثْلُ حَظِّ ٱلْأُنثَيَيْنِ ۗ يُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمْ أَن تَضِلُّوا۟ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌۢ
rows.translation: They ask you for a decision of the law. Say: Allah gives you a decision concerning the person who has neither parents nor offspring; if a man dies (and) he has no son and he has a sister, she shall have half of what he leaves, and he shall be her heir she has no son; but if there be two (sisters), they shall have two-thirds of what he leaves; and if there are brethren, men and women, then the male shall have the like of the portion of two females; Allah makes clear to you, lest you err; and Allah knows all things.
rows.transliteration: yastaftūnaka qulillāhu yuftīkum fil kalālah ۚ inim-ru-un halaka laysa lahu waladun walahu ukhtun falahā niṣfu mā tarak ۚ wahuwa yarithuhā in lam yakun lahā walad ۚ fa-in kānatath-natayni falahumath thuluthāni mimmā tarak ۚ wa in kānū ikhwatan rijālan wanisā-an falidhhakari mithlu ḥaẓẓil-unthayayn ۗ yubayyinullāhu lakum an taḍillū ۗ wallāhu bikulli shay-in `alīm
